text: User, an ECE master's student at NYU Tandon aiming for system-level or AI infrastructure roles, should take ECE-GY 6913 first to build foundational knowledge in computing architectures and hardware-software co-design.
User's long-term career directions: AI infrastructure / low-level systems
User's profile: ECE master's student, NYU Tandon, graduate student

User: ECE-GY 6143 和 ECE-GY 6913 哪一门更适合想做AI infra的学生？
Assistant: ECE-GY 6913 is more suitable for a student aiming at AI infrastructure and low-level systems. It provides a foundational understanding of computing architectures, hardware-software co-design, and the limitations of silicon and interconnects—key topics for designing efficient, energy-aware AI infrastructure. In contrast, ECE-GY 6143 focuses on machine learning algorithms and is more aligned with AI model development than low-level system design.

Personal note: Given your goal in AI infrastructure, ECE-GY 6913 will better prepare you for system-level challenges in hardware and architecture.
